attributes.action: put a stop to the Contact Point Children's Database
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the Prime Minister to put a stop to the idea of the Contact Point children’s database. It will never be secure, it is an idea that is potentially dangerous, and is an invasion of privacy. 

Following the loss of numerous public information over the last year, those with children under 18 and other individuals have lost all trust in Government departments. 

It is also extremely unjust that MPs, council members and celebrities have their own rules that their details would be kept off of the database. 

We want children to be protected, but by creating a database covering details of all children that is accessible by thousands, it is not ensuring their safety, especially when CRB checks on staff members do not always follow correct procedures, placing children in further danger.

Stop this now!
